attributes.action: Close all building sites and platform hire companies due to COVID19
attributes.additional_details: Close down all construction sites and platform hire companies Because my husband is currently putting us all at risk because the buses think platform hire companies are essential due to building sites still up and running it is a breeding ground for Covid 19 people are not staying 2 meters apart and the only way they will close is if the government enforces this closure
attributes.background: I would like the Government to Close down all construction sites and platform hire companies
